citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
Philip M Dolci was inspected on April 5,2023, at the Oak Mountain State Fair in Pelham, AL. The 6:00 pm performance
was observed.
At the time of inspection, the documented program of environmental enhancement for non-human primates was
inadequate. It did not address all of the elements required by the Animal Welfare Regulations.
An adequate environmental enhancement program is essential in promoting the psychological well-being of non-human
primates. Dealers. Exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan for
environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of non-human primates.
To be corrected by May 3, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.81 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
Philip M Dolci was inspected on April 5,2023, at the Oak Mountain State Fair in Pelham, AL. The 6:00 pm performance 
was observed. 
 
At the time of inspection, the documented program of environmental enhancement for non-human primates was 
inadequate. It did not address all of the elements required by the Animal Welfare Regulations.  
 
An adequate environmental enhancement program is essential in promoting the psychological well-being of non-human 
primates. Dealers. Exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan for 
environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of non-human primates.  
 
To be corrected by May 3, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
